description.tree-enhancer.dateTimeFormat:
Date and time display format. Supported placeholders:
- YYYY: Four-digit year
- MM: Two-digit month (01-12)
- DD: Two-digit day (01-31)
- HH: Two-digit hour (00-23)
- mm: Two-digit minute (00-59)
- ss: Two-digit second (00-59)
description.tree-enhancer.debugMode: Enable debug mode. When enabled, detailed extension logs will be output to the console for troubleshooting.
description.tree-enhancer.fileSizeBase: File size calculation base. Choose 1000 (decimal, using KB / MB / GB units) or 1024 (binary, using KiB / MiB / GiB units).
description.tree-enhancer.fileTemplate:
Display template for file hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: File name
- {size}: File size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw file size (in bytes)
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
description.tree-enhancer.folderCalculat:
Display template for folder calculating state. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: Folder name
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
description.tree-enhancer.folderTemplate:
Display template for folder hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: Folder name
- {size}: Folder size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw folder size (in bytes)
- {fileCount}: Number of child files
- {folderCount}: Number of child folders
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
description.tree-enhancer.folderTimeoutT:
Display template for folder calculation timeout. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: Folder name
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
- {maxCalculationTime}: Maximum calculation time (ms)
description.tree-enhancer.imageFileTempl:
Display template for image file hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: File name
- {size}: File size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw file size (in bytes)
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
- {resolution}: Image resolution
- {width}: Image width
- {height}: Image height
description.tree-enhancer.imageResolutio:
Display template for image resolution information. Supported placeholders:
- {width}: Image width in pixels
- {height}: Image height in pixels
description.tree-enhancer.largeFileThres: Large file recognition threshold in user-configured units (MB or MiB). Files exceeding this size will display an orange 'L' badge. Set to 0 to disable large file recognition.
description.tree-enhancer.maxCalculation: Maximum wait time (milliseconds) for folder size calculation. Calculation will stop and show a message if this time is exceeded. Default is 100ms, ensuring high performance. For large, complex folders (e.g., node_modules), 100ms is usually insufficient. If you need to include them, increase this value (max 60 seconds), but note this may affect performance.
description.tree-enhancer.refreshInterva: Automatic refresh interval (in seconds) for file decorations. Set to 0 to disable automatic refresh. Defaults to 60 seconds, ensuring file information stays up-to-date without manual intervention.
description.tree-enhancer.startupDelay: Delay (in seconds) before the extension starts working after VS Code startup. This significantly prevents high CPU usage during startup. Set to 0 for no delay (calculates immediately on startup).
